import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get account balance"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/accounts/{accountId}/balance"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



* Sending a **GET** request on this endpoint allows to **get account balance**.


> Note: this resource is available for prepaid customers only.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"accountId","in":"path","description":"You must replace *{accountId}* with the accountid that you want to use.","required":true,"schema":{"maxLength":36,"minLength":32,"pattern":"^[0-9A-Fa-f]{8}[-]?(?:[0-9A-Fa-f]{4}[-]?){3}[0-9A-Fa-f]{12}$","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
